apple_vendor_description: This festive Mx. Claus emoji on Apple devices features a joyful, gender-neutral figure with a medium skin tone, radiating holiday cheer with rosy cheeks and a twinkling smile. Appleâ€™s iconic glossy 3D rendering brings out the plush texture of their red and white trimmed coat, and the soft, rounded edges give a welcoming, magical feel. It's a perfect emoji to express the spirit of the holiday season, generosity, and festive anticipation.
